wikipedia_page.main: Paul McFadden (born 14 September 1965) is a Scottish retired professional footballer. Active in both Scotland and Australia, McFadden played as a midfielder.

response: Paul McFadden (born September 24, 1961) is a former American football placekicker in the National Football League.  He gained recognition at the collegiate level as a kicker at Youngstown State University.  McFadden became widely known for his barefooted kicking style.
